alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Southeast St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 15 at 3:25PM CST until December 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Southern Hancock County. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...For the the coastal flood advisory, flooding of low lying lots, roads and parks, with only isolated road closures. For the coastal flood watch, numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property may be inundated, with flooding of some unelevated structures.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Southeast St. Tammany
